title: Professional Services
content:

  • architecture
  • installation

  • hunting

title: Onsite Training
content:
We are the only official source for onsite Security Onion training and our instructors are the only Security Onion Certified Instructors in the world!

We ofer multi-day comprehensive training classes with lots of labs and real-world case studies for reinforcement! Students receive printed course materials and walk out of class with a Certificate of Completion ready to make their adversaries cry!

Click here for pricing and registration for Security Onion live public courses

Have at least 8 students and want private training at your facility in the continental United States? Please email us for pricing and availability.

We are proud to offer GSA pricing through our partner IntelliGenesis!
Eligible organizations, please email us here for more information.

title: Online Training
content:
We also offer online training via on-demand training modules. They are a cost-effective alternative to onsite training, but do not include the in-depth, hands-on labs that our onsite classes do.

The following on-demand training modules are pre-recorded and can be accessed immediately upon payment and for 60 days thereafter:

  • Security Onion 101: Introduction to Security Onion
  • Security Onion 201: Best Practices for Production Deployments
  • Security Onion 301: Best Practices for Distributed Deployments

Best value! Purchase all 3 classes in a discounted bundle!

Click here for pricing and registration for Security Onion on-demand training
